This versatile machine allows you to make lattes, steamers,... More
Easily create an array of delicious beverages with the Cecilware GB5MF-IT-LD multi-flavor powdered cappuccino dispenser! This versatile machine allows you to make lattes, steamers, cappuccino, and more with the simple push of a button! This unit is great for operator or self-serve use, making it perfect for your convenience store, snack bar, cafe, hotel, or other establishment. - Makes up to 12 different drinks with just 5 ingredients - One, 10 lb. hopper and four, 2 lb. hoppers - 3.5 gallon tank capacity - LED display allows operator to select various functions including water temperature and records of cups dispensed - Fast flowing dispensing is 30% faster than traditional units, reducing wear and tear on parts - Power whip creates a delicious creamy beverage - Stainless steel drip tray catches spills and overflow - Vacuum steam removal system keeps powdered mix dry to eliminate clogging - Moisture and powder collection tray keeps vacuum motor clean - Self cleaning cycle rinses whipper chamber at the end of each cycle - Easy-to-change "cappuccino" graphic on illuminated front panel The Cecilware GB5MF-IT-LD is UL and NSF Listed and requires a 1/4" water line and 120V electrical connection for operation. Please consult the Specification Sheet for additional details and installation requirements. Easily create an array of delicious beverages with the Cecilware GB5MF-HC-IT-LD multi-flavor powdered hot chocolate dispenser! This versatile machine allows you to make a variety of delicious chocolatey treats with the simple push of a button! This unit is great for operator or self-serve use, making it perfect for your convenience store, snack bar, cafe, hotel, or other establishment. - Makes up to 12 different drinks with just 5 ingredients - Two, 5 lb. hoppers (one for milk) and four, 2 lb. hoppers - 3.5 gallon tank capacity - LED display allows operator to select various functions including water temperature and records of cups dispensed - Fast flowing dispensing is 30% faster than traditional units, reducing wear and tear on parts - Power whip creates a delicious creamy beverage - Stainless steel drip tray catches spills and overflow - Vacuum steam removal system keeps powdered mix dry to eliminate clogging - Moisture and powder collection tray keeps vacuum motor clean - Self cleaning cycle rinses whipper chamber at the end of each cycle - Easy-to-change "cappuccino" graphic on illuminated front panel The Cecilware GB5MF-HC-IT-LD is UL and NSF Listed and requires a 1/4" water line and 120V electrical connection for operation. Please consult the Specification Sheet for additional details and installation requirements. Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/3PE four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation to accommodate fruit juice and dairy products, it is perfect for serving fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/4PE beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed. Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. Because each bowl has its own motor, the four bowls operate independently of one another so that you have greater control over your beverages. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation for juice or dairy beverages, it is perfect for serving three types of fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed.
